query: Show all active matters that have not been billed within the last 30 days, and have an average work in progress (WIP) age exceeding 60 days organized by client.

steps.message: Analyzing query to identify required data domains and planning retrieval strategy...
steps.details: Decomposing question into sub-queries: (1) Active matters, (2) Billing history <30 days, (3) WIP age >60 days, (4) Client relationships

properties.text: Active matters, no billing 30d, WIP >60d, by client

steps.message: Matter Finance Agent retrieving all active matters from Practice Management System...
steps.details: Querying Elite PMS for matters with status='Active'. Resolving client entities across systems.

agents.name: Matter Finance Agent
agents.action: Retrieving active matters from Elite PMS

steps.message: Revenue Protection Agent analyzing billing history to identify matters without invoices in last 30 days...
steps.details: Cross-referencing matter IDs with Elite Billing module. Filtering for last_invoice_date > 30 days ago.

steps.message: Calculating average WIP age from time entries. Filtering for matters with WIP age exceeding 60 days...
steps.details: Querying Intapp Time for unbilled time entries. Computing weighted average age per matter based on entry dates.

agents.name: Matter Finance Agent
agents.action: Computing WIP age from time entries

steps.message: Enriching results with client relationship data and organizing by client hierarchy...
steps.details: Querying PeopleSoft CRM for client metadata. Resolving entity relationships and building final hierarchy.

finalAnswer.summary: I have reviewed all active matters to identify those without billing activity in the last 30 days. Specifically, I have isolated matters where the average age of unbilled time exceeds 60 days. The following provides a consolidated view of these matters, categorized by client.
